attributes.action: ensure every village has an hourly integrated bus service every day as a minimum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in a village in North Shropshire which is typical in that the bus services are irregular and timetabled irrationally with no links to tains or other services.   I promote an expectation on bus companies to offer useful, regular and  coordinated services to all rural communities, if necessary to be subsidised by central government.
